abstracts.cdata!:
This result profile report talks about
            improving the investment climate for private sector
            development in Rwanda. Rwanda has steadily reformed its
            commercial laws and institutions since 2001 with support
            from the World Bank Group. Rwanda was named the top reformer
            in doing business 2010, having jumped 76 places from 143 to
            67 in the annual ranking of 183 countries, the biggest
            improvement ever by any country. As a result of the
            government’s commitment to reform, it is now easier, faster
            and less expensive to do business in Rwanda.
